do.0: IF YOU ARE UNDER A FLOOD WARNING, FIND SAFE SHELTER RIGHT AWAY
do.1: Do not walk, swim or drive through flood waters. Turn Around, Donâ€™t Drown!
do.2: Stay off of bridges over fast-moving water.
do.3: Depending on the type of flooding:
do.a: Evacuate if told to do so.
do.b: Move to higher ground or a higher floor.
